leong

    • ReloadAction

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      The method to execute the action. It will first check if the Player has the weapon involved. If not, then nothing would be done. Else, the weapon will be reloaded and the bullet will be remove from the Player's inventory.
      Specified by:
      execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor who is attacking
      map - the map the actor is on
      Returns:
      description of what has happened
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor parameter is a null
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if map parameter is a null

    • menuDescription

      public java.lang.String menuDescription​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
      Give a description of what will happen when this action is executed.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      description of the action

    • getAssociated

      public java.lang.String getAssociated()
      Specified by:
      getAssociated in interface game.MenuActionInterface
      Returns:
      the item(its name ) that the Player needs in order for this action to be shown on menu.
